metadata.title: CVE-2021-47446 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/a4xx: fix error handling in a4xx_gpu_init()This code returns 1 on error instead of a negative error.  It leads toan Oops in the caller.  A second problem is that the check for"if (ret != -ENODATA)" cannot be true because "ret" is set to 1.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
